description: This file defines a SearchProvider class that manages the search state for recipes, including debouncing search queries, preloading data, and notifying listeners of state changes. It interacts with an external repository for data fetching.

classes.name: SearchProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier that manages the search state, executes debounced search queries, preloads recipe data, and notifies listeners of updates.

methods.name: updateQuery
methods.description: Updates the search query, handles debounce to limit search frequency, initiates asynchronous search, and updates results.

methods.name: warmUp
methods.description: Preloads all recipes to improve user experience by reducing wait times during searches.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Cancels the debounce timer and disposes of resources when the provider is no longer needed.
